name: Nadolig Llawen bunting
description:
This years must have home decoration! Christmas bunting to decorate your home.

 Merry Christmas in Welsh.

The front is cream cotton fabric. The letters are in the same fabric as the backing.

The final touch to welcome your guests.

Available as a random choice of Christmas fabric.

name: Christmas Pudding Tea Cosie
description:
A seasonal addition to grace any Christmas tea table.

Each cosy has a calico front decorated with recycled fabrics. The back fabrics will vary but all are decorated with holly leaves and berries.

The cosy measures approximately 28 cms wide by 30 cms high and is suitable for a medium sized teapot.

Can be hand washed in cool water.

Handmade in Wales for you at Christmas.

name: Holly Bunting
description:
The ultimate in eco friendly bunting.

This pretty mini bunting is made entirely from scraps of fabric recycled from other projects. Each flag is approximately 10 cms by 10 cms and  there are seven flags along a 1.5 metre length with a 25 cm allowance at each end for tying.

Handmade in Wales to decorate your home this Christmas.

name: Baby's First Christmas Heart
description:
A personalised rustic calico heart.

Red embroidery on a red/white spot fabric, with Baby's name, first Christmas and the year with a red ribbon for hanging. This is a new design for this year and is available in Welsh or English.

Choose to hang it on the tree or on a door or wall. Why not hang it in Baby's room and complete the scene with bunting.

A lasting memento for parents and grandparents alike. The heart is approximately 17 cms by 17 cms.

Each heart comes wrapped in acid free tissue.

Handmade in Wales for you this Christmas.

email- asewingmachine@hotmail.com with name required

name: Mistletoe kiss pin badge
description:
.....A sweet little pin badge that will ensure you are noticed, and kissed, this Christmas.

A red cotton background enhanced  with a mistletoe kiss. The badge is approximately 3.5 cms in diameter.

Buy for yourself or for that special person in your life.

Each badge comes on a card.

Eco friendly and handmade in Wales..
